message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate down to that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to my initial asking price. Would you consider $13,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
Thank you for your follow-up offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still not able to meet your price. I would like to propose $12,500 as a final offer.
